examples.korean: Her latest play is a nihilistic vision of the world of the future. 발음듣기 그녀의 최근 희곡은 미래 세상에 대한 허무주의적 상상도이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her latest play is a nihilistic vision of the world of the future. 발음

examples.korean: a sense of futility 발음듣기 허무감 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Our effort to persuade her proved fruitless. 발음듣기 그녀를 설득하려는 우리의 시도는 허무하게 끝났다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our effort to persuade her proved fruitless. 발음

examples.korean: The accident left me with a sense of futility. 발음듣기 그 사건은 내게 허무감을 안겨 주었다 Dong-a's Prime English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The accident left me with a sense of futility. 발음

examples.korean: It's been another wasted day. 발음듣기 하는 일없이 또 허무하게 보낸 하루였어요. Neungyule
examples.english: It's been another wasted day. 발음
